//TUNCAY
GOOD DAY
HOME TONNAGE OPEN AT ITAQUI ON AROUND 30th Aug - 04th Sept 2024 AGW.
MV SSI INVINCIBLE II
IMO NUMBER: 9434747
56,815 DWT ON 12.80 M SSW
BUILT ON JUNE 2012 IN CHINA
GRT 33.044 / NRT 19,231
LOA 189.99 M / BEAM 32.26 M / TPC 58.80
GRAIN 71,634 CBM / BALE 68,768 CBM
5 HO / 5 HA
CARGO CRANES: IHI-WUHAN X 4 SETS, SWL 30MT WHEN WORKING HOOKS AND SWL  24MT WHEN WORKING WITH GRABS.
GRABS: 4 X REMOTE CONTROLLED GRAB ; CAPACITY 12 M3.
SPEED / CONSUMPTION:
LADEN : ABT 12.00 KNOTS ON ABT 25.0 MT IFO + ABT 0.1 MT MGO
BALLAST : ABT 12.50 KNOTS ON ABT 25.0 MT IFO + ABT 0.1 MT MGO
PORT IDLE : ABT 3.0 MT IFO + ABT 0.25 MT LSMGO
PORT WORKING : ABT 5.0 MT IFO + ABT 0.25 MT LSMGO.
SPEED/CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION UPTO BEAUFORT SCALE 4 (MAX 16 KTS) AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (COMBINED SEA/SWELL/ MAXIMUM SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT OF 1.25 M) AND SMOOTH SEA, NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND/OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, AND ALWAYS
LOADED LESS THAN VESSEL'S MAX SUMMER LOADLINE, EVEN KEEL CONDITION AND ALWAYS EXCLUDING VOYAGES LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, PASSAGES WITH RESTRICTED VISIBILITY,
CONGESTED WATERS, STRAITS, NARROWED WATERS AND WHILE MANEUVERING, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS.
IN CASE OF HOT/COLD CLIMATES AN ADDITIONAL 1MT DAILY CONSUMPTION IS EXPECTED FOR MACHINERY COOLING, AND FUEL HEATING DEMANDS.
IF SEA WATER TEMPERATURE IS BELOW 15 DEGREE CELCIUS THERE WILL BE EXTRA BOILER CONSUMPTION.
PERIODS OF LESS THAN 24 HOURS,FROM NOON REPORT TO NOON REPORT, OF CONTINUOUS GOOD WEATHER TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM DETERMINATION OF THE VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE. UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED BY OWNERS, CHARTERERS MAY NOT DEDUCT OR SET-OFF AMOUNTS FROM HIRE PAYMENTS
FOR SPEED AND/OR OVERCONSUMPTION CLAIMS.
VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO CONSUME DIESEL OIL WHEN MANEUVERING, IN/OUT PORTS, STARTING OF A/E, IN THE BOLIER DURING PORT STAY, BURNING OF SLUDGE OIL IN INCINERATOR, NAVIGATING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY/CONGESTED WATERS/CANALS/RIVERS/DURING PILOTAGE OR FOR SAFETY
OF VESSEL DURING BAD WEATHER/FOG, ALWAYS UNDER DISCRETION OF THE MASTER.
WEATHER ROUTING COMPANY CALCULATION FOR GOOD WEATHER DAYS SHALL BE ONLY APPLICABLE AND LIMITED FOR THE GOOD WEATHER DAYS ONLY AND CANNOT BE SPREAD ALL OVER THE ENTIRE VOYAGE.
-BUNKER QUALITY:
DURING CURRENCY OF THE CHARTER, BUNKERS  TO BE SUPPLIED SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH MIN ISO 8217:2017 SPECIFICATION OR ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
-VLSFO 380 CST: RMG 380 AS PER ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT: 0.5% PCT)
-LSMGO: DMA ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT : 0.1% )
BOTH GRADES ALWAYS TO COMPLY WITH MARPOL 73/78 REQUIREMENTS, REG 14, 18 OF ANNEX VI AND ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
DURING THE CURRENCY OF THIS CHARTER, CHARTERERS ARE ONLY PERMITTED TO SUPPLY ABOVE GRADES TO THE VESSEL.
VESSEL CAN ONLY BE BUNKERED UP TO 85 PCT OF TANK CAPACITY. COMINGLING OF DIFFERENT BUNKER STEMS NOT ALLOWED.
OPL BUNKERING IS NOT ALLOWED.
++
Best Regards,
Tuncay SAVASCI
Densay Shipping and Trading DMCC
As brokers only
Phone: +90 533 290 06 79
Skype: savasci_tuncay@hotmail.com

VESSEL'S M/E BURNS MDO/DMB WHEN MANEUVERING IN/APPROACHES NARROW OR RESTRICTED WATERS INCLUDING CANALS/RIVERS/SHALLOW WATERS/FOG CONDITIONS AND ALSO WHEN ME/GE COLD START APPLICABLE.
BUNKER CONSUMPTION IN PORT:
IN PORT W/O CARGO OPERATIONS – 1.5 MT HFO 380 CST PER DAY PLUS BOILER CONSUMPTION:
A) 1.0 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE ABOVE 15 DEG CELSIUS
B) 1.2 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE FROM 0 AND UPTO 15 DEG CELSIUS
C) 1.5 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE BELOW 0 DEG CELSIUS
IN PORT WITH CARGO OPERATIONS – 3.5 MT HFO 380 CST PER DAY PLUS BOILER CONSUMPTION:
A) 1.0 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE ABOVE 15 DEG CELSIUS
B) 1.2 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE FROM 0 AND UPTO 15 DEG CELSIUS
C) 1.5 MT HFO 380 CST P/DAY WHEN OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE BELOW 0 DEG CELSIUS
ADA WOG.

H+M INSURANCE COMPANY: LLOYDS OF LONDON.
